hero.title: Hey, I'm Fabricio
hero.description: Egressed in Computer Systems Engineering from Universidad del Valle. Full-Stack Developer: frontend with Next.js, React, Astro, Tailwind & Figma, backend with Laravel & Firebase. I design in Figma and code to productionâ€”including several freelance projects from Figma to deploy. I build end-to-end at Reborn Developments and Rekaliber. Former Team Leader at GoIT. DevOps with Dokploy, VPS and Cloudflare. From Cochabamba, Bolivia ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡´.

reborn.title: Full-Stack Developer
reborn.description: Full-stack development (frontend and backend) for the Reborn ecosystem: Reborn Developments (investment platform), Reborn Rental (construction equipment rental), and Reborn Host (property management). Work with Next.js, Laravel, and related stacks. Server management and deployment with Dokploy, Hostinger VPS, and Cloudflare.

goit.title: Full Stack Team Leader
goit.description: Team Leader of the full-stack project for the GOIT developers academy, developing a web/mobile platform with NextJS, Expo, and PostgreSQL. Led the integration of Moodle into the platform to manage educational content and enhance the learning experience for students.

rekaliber.title: Full-Stack Developer
rekaliber.description: Development of Rekaliber, a complete environment and system currently in development. Full-stack implementation with Next.js and Laravel, covering frontend and backend.

founder.title: Software Project Manager & Founder
founder.description: Founder and project manager at FluenceSoft, a software development company. Leading multiple development teams, overseeing project delivery, and ensuring high-quality software solutions for clients.

spm.title: Software Project Manager (SPM)
spm.description: Managed five development teams, ensuring project requirements were met on time. Provided training in ReactJS and React Native, supervised repositories, and integrated multiple codebases.

freelance.title: Full-Stack Developer
freelance.description: Developed web and mobile applications using ReactJS, React Native, and Laravel. Specialized in database design, UI/UX improvements, and full-stack development.

grb.title: GRB Group - Corporate Website
grb.description: Modern corporate website built with Astro for GRB Group, a global real estate company. Features elegant and professional design with intuitive navigation, dynamic sections, and SEO optimization to showcase real estate investment and technology services.

tracto.title: Tracto Camiones Andina
tracto.description: An ecommerce application designed to facilitate direct communication between clients and truck dealers. Built with WordPress, it provides a robust platform for heavy vehicle inventory management and sales.

rebornrental.title: Reborn Rental - Construction Equipment Rental
rebornrental.description: A construction equipment rental website based in Denver, Colorado. Developed with Laravel and Blade, it features Odoo integration for comprehensive management.

reborn.title: Reborn Developments - Investment Platform
reborn.description: Modern web platform for international investments built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS on the frontend, and Laravel on the backend. Offers real estate project management, risk analysis, and global investment opportunities with intuitive interface and advanced technical analysis.

rebornhost.title: Reborn Host - Property Management
rebornhost.description: Landing page for Reborn Host, a company specialized in short-term rental property management for Airbnb, VRBO, Booking.com and other platforms. Simple, responsive site built with pure HTML and CSS showcasing services, pricing and co-founders.

eipet.title: Eipet - Pet Store E-commerce
eipet.description: E-commerce site for a veterinary pet store: browse and buy products for dogs and cats. Built with Astro and Firebase (frontend and backend). Features product catalog, categories, cart, user auth, and admin panel. Deployed on Vercel temporarily.

hydraulics.title: Hydraulic Sistem - E-commerce Repuestos HidrÃ¡ulicos
hydraulics.description: E-commerce for hydraulic parts and repair services for agricultural and heavy machinery. Built with Astro and Firebase, hosted on Vercel. Features services catalog, product cart, WhatsApp-based sales, and quote requests for cylinders, pumps, motors and valves.

recommendation.title: Engineering Recommendation Letter
recommendation.description: Official recommendation letter from Universidad del Valle

goit.title: GoIT CEO Recommendation Letter
goit.description: Official recommendation letter from GoIT CEO for excellent work as Full Stack Team Leader.

sedes.title: SEDES Participation Certificate
sedes.description: Certificate of participation in the SEDES Tuberculosis website project

tracto.title: Tracto Camiones Andina Certificate
tracto.description: Certification of participation in the Tracto Camiones Andina website project

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: My name is Fabricio Rene Crespo Rossel, and I'm 22 years old. I have completed all academic semesters for Computer Systems Engineering, with only the final degree certification pending. I've been programming since I was 12, and I love both crafting interfaces and designing APIs and systemsâ€”true full-stack.
about.paragraph2: One of my significant achievements is delivering five deployment-ready projects at UMA for Universidad del Valle, which earned me a letter of recommendation from my department director.
about.paragraph3: I work as a Full-Stack Developer across the whole stack: frontend with Next.js, React, Astro, Tailwind CSS, Figma for design and prototyping, and modern UI; backend with Laravel, Firebase and REST APIs. I have delivered several freelance projects from Figma mockups to production. I apply this at Reborn Developments (Reborn Developments, Reborn Rental, Reborn Host) and on Rekaliber (Next.js + Laravel). I also do DevOpsâ€”deployment and servers with Dokploy, Hostinger VPS and Cloudflare. I was Full Stack Team Leader at GoIT, leading the project and integrating Moodle.
about.paragraph4: My goal is to keep growing as a full-stack developerâ€”from UI and UX to APIs, databases and deploymentâ€”and as a project manager who ships quality software and leads teams effectively.
